sentences.sContent: Kelly is from Jamaica. When she went to England with her parents, her aunt Mary met them at Heathrow Airport.
sentences.sContent_eng: Kelly is from Jamaica. When she went to England with her parents, her aunt Mary met them at Heathrow Airport.
sentences.sCn: 凯丽是牙买加人，当她随着父母来到英国时，她的阿姨玛丽在希思罗机场接她们。
